Name: Southern Manhattan
Ingredients: 20 ml Southern/Louisiana-style whisky liqueur (e.g. Southern Comfort)
3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A Sweet Manhattan with Southern USA style whiskey liqueur and Creole-style bitters adding a hint of southern flavour.
History: Created in by yours truly in August 2005 for Tales of the Cocktail, New Orleans, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Southern Manhattan contains 205 calories
